wow, this plane is really nice
There is a severe bug in this aircraft. The 'rain' textures for all windows appear to be missing.

Don't mind my last comment. If you also have problems with 'greyed out' windows after installing the Acceleration expansion, just replace the new rain textures with the old FS 9 rain textures. I dont know about FS9, but in FSX they are located in the main FSX textures folder.
I'd seriously love to see the new Twin Commanche on here.  Anyone know where this baby's at?  Maybe another torrent site?

I install it good but when it comes to open the airplane it opens but after a little while it tells me "Fatal Error, Windows is restaring FSX" and i cant play does anyone know what can i do ?? please help me ! i have FSX please somebody tell me how can I fly this airplane !
The Citation II Expansion pack would be great too if it's out there somewhere. For FS9 and/or FSX.
Fatal error here. Acceleration installed. You guys with the plane working have acceleration?
I installed and ran this addon without any issues and yes I have installed Acceleration installed.
Won't load, error, crashes the FSX sim, not got acceleration pack either, and I was looking forward to this plane, .........doh!
I am getting the same fatal error.  New install of FSX plus Accelleration.  Hmmm.

Whenever I try to fly the plane.. either on freeflight or multiplayer, before it loads my FSX gets a fatal error and restarts. It does this all the time. And yes I did re-install it. Anyone know what im doing wrong?
Same fatal error as everyone else. Anyone else feel like uploading it? I was really wanting to fly this...thanks guys.
Fatal error on FSX for me too.  Did the usual Eaglesoft procedure - reboot computer after installing, load a default equivalent first in 2d cockpit (Lear45), and then switch to this.
